value.title: DRG's BROOD WAR Unit Only Challenge! (StarCraft 2)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of high level StarCraft 2 between DRG (Zerg) and Astrea (Protoss). In this SC2 match it's almost as if DRG decides to focus on making StarCraft: Brood War units only, as he really doesn't play any units that were added with the introduction of Wings of Liberty and StarCraft 2 overall.
